title: The Fighting lady: a drama of the Pacific
creator_credit: Louis de Rochemont Associates and Twentieth Century-Fox Film Corporation
brief_description: Incredible and rare footage of World War Two combat shot by U.S. combat men. An authentic record, starting in January 1943 - planes join an aircraft carrier and proceed to action in the pacific; Marcus Island, August 1943 - footage of Japanese Kamikaze pilots dive bombing U.S. planes at the carrier.
